Complete Maintenance Management

Preventence brings everything you need to streamline preventive maintenance — from intelligent scheduling to real-time asset insights.

Smart Scheduling

Automate preventive maintenance planning with intelligent scheduling and technician optimization.

  • • Auto-generate work orders
  • • Assign by skill and availability
  • • Reduce human scheduling errors

Live Analytics

Monitor OEE, downtime, and task completion in real time through interactive dashboards.

  • • Real-time KPI dashboards
  • • Downtime root cause analysis
  • • Performance trends

Digital SOPs

Standardize procedures with interactive checklists, SOP documents, and compliance tracking.

  • • Custom checklists
  • • Photo & note capture
  • • Audit compliance reports

Asset Intelligence

Centralized asset management with machine history, version control, and lifecycle analytics.

  • • Machine history & logs
  • • Version tracking
  • • Health scoring

Role-Based Access

Give Admins, Supervisors, and Technicians proper permissions to maintain workflow control.

  • • Granular permissions
  • • Department access limits
  • • User activity logs

Smart Inventory

Track spare parts, modules, and components linked with machine IDs for effortless inventory visibility.

  • • Parts version control
  • • Low-stock alerts
  • • Auto-linking with assets

Trusted Across Industries

Preventence empowers diverse industries to optimize their maintenance operations, ensuring safety, uptime, and efficiency — no matter the scale.

Manufacturing

Streamline plant maintenance with automated scheduling and machine-level insights for optimal uptime.

Energy & Utilities

Monitor critical equipment health and prevent downtime with real-time performance dashboards.

Logistics & Fleet

Ensure smooth operations and reduce breakdowns with preventive care for vehicles and conveyors.

Healthcare & Pharma

Maintain compliance and operational safety for sensitive medical and production equipment.

Whether you manage a factory floor, an energy plant, or a fleet operation — Preventence keeps your equipment running smoothly.
